SEARCH
Package pcf.api

Interface Location

All Superinterfaces:
BundleProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
LocationGroup, Wizard
public interface Location extends BundleProvider
The base Gosu class for all PCF Location derived classes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cancel()
    Takes out of edit mode, not saving changes
    void
    commit()
    Saves changes and takes out of edit mode.
    Location
    getCurrentLocation()
    Get the current top location of the containing stack
    String
    getId()
    Gets the id
    boolean
    isInEditMode()
    Returns true if the location is in edit mode, false otherwise.
    Object
    loadFromDB(Object bean)
    Reloads a bean from the database, importing it into the current locations bundle.
    void
    startEditing()
    Puts into edit mode, making committable/cancelable changes to data possible

    Methods inherited from interface gw.pl.persistence.core.BundleProvider

    getBundle

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Gets the id

    • startEditing

      void startEditing()
      Puts into edit mode, making committable/cancelable changes to data possible

    • commit

      void commit()
      Saves changes and takes out of edit mode. If the commit fails, a runtime exception is guaranteed to be thrown.

    • cancel

      void cancel()
      Takes out of edit mode, not saving changes

    • loadFromDB

      Object loadFromDB(Object bean)
      Reloads a bean from the database, importing it into the current locations bundle.

    • isInEditMode

      boolean isInEditMode()
      Returns true if the location is in edit mode, false otherwise. Note: This does not tell you if a particular widget is editable, only that the current location is in edit mode, and therefore may commit its bundle.

    • getCurrentLocation

      Location getCurrentLocation()
      Get the current top location of the containing stack
